p: Since 1978, at least 19 subtypes of HAdV-7 had been identified based on restriction enzyme analysis (REA) [ 16]. Compared with sequences for known genotypes listed in Table 2, no obvious characteristic differences were observed among different types across three genes, e.g., strain human/USA/CL_44/1988/7[P7H7F7] (genotype 7a), strain NHRC 1315 (genotype 7b), strain hAdV/Saint-Petersburg/43/2013 (genotype 7d2), and strain CQ1198 (genotype 7d; Fig 1).
